Contributors

Feldspar is currently being developed by projects at Chalmers University of Technology, SICS Swedish ICT AB and Ericsson AB.

ELTE University contributed the initial design and implementation of the feldspar-compiler package.

Feldspar is available under a BSD license and is openly developed on github. Contributions and improvements are always welcome.
